lenders.name: Malouh
lenders.loan_because:
We need more resources to further improve our work. For this we need your ajuda.Precisamos safety equipment, transportation, photography, to the workshops and lectures. We count on your support.

Terra da PAZ Group and ecofotografia 
sites: www.terradapaz.org
www.ecofotografias.fot.br
lenders.occupational_info:
The Land of PEACE program has as basic purposes the inclusion of children and youngster aged from 6 to 21 years old , in a process of sensitization, self-valuation and self-discipline, attained through the art of ceramics in multiple workshops and some other complementary workings.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jLgiAjF6zfo

 

 Echo Photography is the means of environment sensitization developed by the Ecolambelambe project in its workshops. It stimulates the care with Nature and environment and historical research. 

 

Instrumentality and Ceramic Molding: the participant learns how to mold its form, making clear his authorship in the process.  

 

Mosaic: it harmonizes that which is the depredated, broken, in shards, harmonizing the new image in a new expressive form.

 

 Painting of Panels: Ceramic on tiles, floors and small flagstones,  showing the expression and disclosing, through the use of colors, the participant´s relation with the world, his conquest of PEACE. 

 

Ambient sensitization: we work encouraging the use, in depth, of perception, through exercises and tricks that, through the art or of environment, keep us in touch with the here and now, and our necessities and responsibilities in taking care of  the environment around us, either in its transformation or preservation. 

 

Lectures for the community: we dedicate ourselves mainly to the necessity of Art as a development of the Human Being and to the Lectures on Environment Sensitization. We deliver constant lectures approaching subjects of interest, necessary to the improvement of the quality of life in the community, and also on subjects related to the work in itself, developed by the members of the workshops. 

 

News Letter All Blue one: A weekly newsletter, where we report  the performances of Land of the PEACE and the other projects it generates, such as  Arts of the Curupira (Environmental Education). The works developed in all the workshops aim to the Revitalization Project, which renovates dammaged public parks and public spaces, deteriorating or about to deteriorate,  transforming the space “of nobody” into a space for all. This work is directed by the painter Odilon Cavalcanti and the photographer Malouh Gualberto. Website: www.artesdatraca.com.br in connection, via link, with the project www.terradapaz.org and http://terradapazcultural.blogspot.com (cultural actions and expositions of art and Ecophotos) where more information can be accessed. We are sure to be able to contribute socially, not only through the activities of social responsability, but also as far as the aspect of valuation of public spaces and  environmental sensitization are concerned. We want to show a little of the “makings", in a proposal of solidarity and creative human development that the Program Land of the Peace contains. Therefore, we invite you to pay a call to our site and to give support to our initiative.  

Tel 551144854061

 email:

 terradapazorm@terra.com.br 

  ecolambelambe@terra.com.br

Skype: ecolambelambe

Cell phone: 5511 97071362 

 

 

 

 



 

Ecolambelambe Project/ Echophotographies (Ecofotografias.com)
Please kindly acknowledge receipt 



Ecolambelambe Project is born from the need to show through photographic records the
exuberance of nature, its forests and its grandeur, giving support to those
who preserve it. 

The magnificence of its environment goes far beyond our basic needs for
water and oxygen, but it faces the danger of destruction, the so
talked about global warming, entirely due to human callousness. 

Based on the need for awareness of the Human Being, Ecolambelambe Project 
spreads the seed of ecofotografia by showing details of Musa, his priority in
preservation. Another way is to publicize, through its exhibitions,
sustainability and ecotourism projects that provide development and
conservation,  walking hand in hand in several regions, such as the
Vale do Ribeira, in São Paulo state, with its marvellous caves and grottos. 

Philosophy 

The forest itself is a living being, and we see ourselves as belonging to
it.  The forest is not our property, at our dispposal. And this has been our challenge. 

Ecolambelambe Project tries to translate into its images some of this magnitude,
which has much to teach us and  goes far beyond mere fads or human needs.
We are aware of the need to respect everything that surround us.  We advocate the the use of ecophotography as a tool and a stimulus to the ever present and continuous care of the
environment, by which we encourage self esteem, authorship and creative and sensitive actions. 



Thus, the Ecofotografias of Ecolambelambe Project are meant to promote
conservation and awareness, inherent in the process triggered by the
photo and its language. This is precisely our task in our exhibitions and workshops.



We also sell ecophotos as a means to provide continuity to our research and our work.  It is, therefore, an environment project, and thus we are building a space for sustainability.   Please access the blog of our present exhibit:  http://trilhasdoolhar.blogspot.com .  Our main site: www.ecofotografias.com 

Action 

Lectures and workshops ecofotografias meant for field monitors and multipliers. 

Workshops for Schools and the Elderly. 

You Tube-Publication Ecolambelambe.  Slide show produced by park officials 

Channel created videos for neighborhood associations, monitors and
people who can replicate the project. 

Exhibition of ecofotographies by Malouh Gualberto and Team.   Odilon Cavalcanti, plastic and graphic artist, is the curator.   Settings by architect Cesar FEDAT.  Jaime Maciel is the consulting biologist and environmentalist. 

 

Exhibition of ceramic pannels (paintings), an artistic  look at the Atlantic Forest, southeast Brazil.

Mini exhibits in shop-centers with great flow of people. 

Exhibition in Cultural Centers and Universities

Carlos Botelho State Park - São Miguel Arcanjo SP

The project  has already more than 40.000 photographic records of the
parks of São Paulo State,  (Conservation Units) plus over 10,000 photos of Serra da
Cantareira (São Paulo)  and Amazon. 

We are currently doing research on the trails of Portuguese pioneers, Indians and Africans in the Atlantic forest, southeast Brazil.  It is our intention to present the results of our research  in Portugal, next year

lenders.name: JR_Hamburg
lenders.loan_because: i can
lenders.occupational_info: i do what i want to

lenders.name: Vince
lenders.loan_because: It's the best way to ensure more have access to the funds that will get them started in business and life!
lenders.occupational_info: I started as an entrepreneur, with a few small businesses, worked in private and public sector for 40 years and now starting a small business again!  It’s the best way to stay in the community and participate in the now and future.

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: Living in the United States I am very fortunate.  I realize and appreciate that $9 can buy myself 2 fancy coffees or feed someone else in Africa for a whole year.  I think the later is more important, don't you?
lenders.occupational_info: I develop web applications, that is I create interactive web sites people can visit on the Internet.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to give disadvantaged people the ability to help themselves though entrepreneurship, and thus a chance for them to have more freedom and to live their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I source electronic products for distribution in Australia.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I knew I lived in a country of plenty but after reading the book Half The Sky I wanted to be able to help others achieve their goals of supporting their families with the basics of food and shelter.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother who helps support the family by working part time outside of the home doing books for other people.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: every little bit helps
lenders.occupational_info: I am a finance student and I just go to school right now. I am looking forward to seeing where God takes me after school. I am really excited about helping people get the loans they need. Its one thing to give a man a fish, but its so much better to help him learn how to fish! I am so glad that even as a college student I can help even in a small way!

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the risks of natural catastrophes (like floods, tsunamis, earthquake ) for my company

lenders.name: Chellis
lenders.loan_because: my humanist values place a responsibility on me to assist others.  The easy way out is to sigh and say, "It's God's will, but I'll pray for you."  Comfortable, but wrong. No, it is our will, and so it is also our responsibility--to perform good acts, not just think them.
lenders.occupational_info: Seriously? It's nothing more than the Golden Rule in action: Treat others how you would wish to be treated. If you are in trouble do you want someone to pray to their imaginary being and go on with their comfortable lives? Or would you rather they leave their comfort zone and actually reach out a hand to help you? (Without also trying to persuade you that you must believe in their imaginary being.)

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I love being able to help other people make a better life for themselves and their families. I believe women will change the world.

lenders.name: Sylvester
lenders.loan_because: I should
lenders.occupational_info: I fix computer systems for doctors

lenders.name: Maio/Westmoreland Family
lenders.loan_because: I can.
